"The Chocolate Way":
"This is an unofficial request from me, Xie!
The Naura Cake Shop has re-opened right
in the heart of Amduscia's Volcanic Caves!
It's Valentine's Day, so every woman on
the ship wants to check it out!
Why don't you find someone to take along
with you and see what happens?
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
